{{infobox character | people=[[Gondorians|Gondorian]] | name=Calimmacil | image= | caption= | pronun=[[Quenya|Q]], {{IPA|[kaˈlimːakil]}} | othernames= | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation= | language=[[Westron]] | birth=Mid-18th C. [[Third Age]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Anárion]] | parentage=[[Arciryas]] | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Siriondil (son of Calimmacil)|Siriondil]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Calimmacil''' was a [[Gondorians|Gondorian]] nobleman. ==History== Calimmacil was the son of [[Arciryas]], and therefore a nephew of [[Narmacil II]] ({{TA|1684}}-{{TA|1856|n}}), the 29th [[Kings of Gondor|King of Gondor]]. Calimmacil had a son, [[Siriondil (son of Calimmacil)|Siriondil]], and a grandson, [[Eärnil II|Eärnil]]. Nothing is known about the life of Calimmacil, who enters history because after King [[Ondoher]] and his sons were slain in battle, his grandson Eärnil was chosen to succeed Ondoher to the throne.{{App|Gondor}} ==Etymology== ''Calimmacil'' is [[Quenya]]. It is not glossed, but as Paul Strack explains, it probably means "Bright Sword", from ''[[kalima|calima]]'' ("bright") and ''[[macil]]'' ("sword").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1529288863.html|articlename=Q.
